content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest, Max. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable, but I do have some conditions that I would like to make clear. Would you be willing to discuss the terms with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month. Thank you for your time, I will take the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Max. Thank you for choosing me as your landlord. I look forward to our future rental arrangements.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I just wanted to let you know that I will be moving in on the 1st of July and I will need to sign the lease agreement before then. Is there anything else I need to do in addition to signing the lease agreement?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I understand that you are excited to move in. In addition to signing the lease agreement, there may be some other paperwork that you will need to fill out, such as a security deposit agreement and a rental agreement. I will provide you with all of the necessary documents and explain them to you in detail. Once you have signed the lease agreement and completed all of the paperwork, you will be ready to move in on the 1st of July.
name: Heinrich Heine
